original_title: Paris By Night 92: Nhạc Yêu Cầu
overview: Paris By Night 92: Nhạc Yêu Cầu (English Translation: Music Requests) was filmed on May 10, 2008 and May 11, 2008 at Knott's Berry Farm, California. In an attempt to make the programs more diverse, Thúy Nga had encouraged the fans to send in their requests in the format of video clips. The requested songs can be done by an individual or a group of people. Phạm Quỳnh Anh made a special appearance singing her signature song "Hello Vietnam" in the show.
title: Paris By Night 92: Nhạc Yêu Cầu
